title: Building Bridges with John Kirbow
description:
Had an informative chat with John Kirbow a couple of months back. He is a conflict communications specialist, and we spoke about how to most effectively speak to those across the isle
Listen to the podcast version here:https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Building-Bridges-with-John-Kirbow-e90k9e

Follow John @JohnKirbow
Follow me on twitter @AndeaLynnLewis
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
